abstract: Disney sold 294,000 starter kit units of the game  in August, normally a slow sales month for video games.
snippet: Disney sold 294,000 starter kit units of the game  in August, normally a slow sales month for video games.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES – — Disney’s new Infinity video game is a hit out of the gate, but it is too early to say whether the release will deliver the kind of blockbuster holiday sales that the company’s struggling interactive division needs for a turnaround.

headline.main: Disney Infinity Game Has Strong Early Sales
